text: (nabiyē! oba mema dharmaya samudīraṇaya kaḷa avasthāvēdī) obaṭa savan dena aya (men siṭinnan) obagen ǣt vī piṭamaṁ vū vahāma, (viśvāsavantayin vana mema dharma) gnānaya labā denu læbū ayaṭa (samaccalayen “obagē nabi vana) ohu, ṭikakaṭa kaḷin kumak nam kīvehida?”yi vimasannanda ovungen siṭinnāha. mevænnangē hṛdayan mata allāh mudrā kara hæriyēya. (ebævin) movun tamangē (śarīra) āśāvan anugamanaya karamin kaṭayutu karannāha
